      Parameters:
      path - the path to the game assets
      maxSprites - maximum allowed sprites to draw at one time

      framebuffer -

    • preUpdate

    • preRender

      public final void preRender​(org.mini2Dx.core.Graphics graphics)
      Run just before the Engine render method. Used to set up system objects before doing any Engine rendering. Applies the viewports and preRenders the screen.
      Parameters:
      graphics -
